title: As an EBIS Admin, I want users without a user access permission to be locked out
custom_steps:
AC:
 - If any group of users has their access turned off, the system will also turn off the access for users who do not have a User Access permission
 - When access is restored, the users missing the User Access permission will also have their access restored

title: As an EBIS Admin, I want all new users to be given a User Access role
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a new ebis account is created, they will automatically receive one of the new user access roles
 - If the user is a Club or No Org user, they will receive the EBIS-CLUB permission
 - If the user is a BOC user, they will receive the EBIS-BOC-LOW permission

title: Create mapping for new user access permissions
custom_steps:
Related to: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-873

There will be a new role based mapping created to ensure all existing users have the correct permission added to their account.

title: As an EBIS Admin User, I want a new permission groups created for different user types
custom_steps:
AC:

* In order to facilitate turning off access for different user types, new permission groups will be created for the following types:
** EBIS Super Admin: EBIS-SUPER-ADMIN
** BOC High: EBIS-BOC-HIGH
** BOC Low: EBIS-BOC-LOW
** Club User (will include No Org): EBIS-CLUB
** Link Access: EBIS-LINK
** AMT: EBIS-AMT
** WLP (wonâ€™t need a new permission)
* The permissions will be able to be added to individual accounts through the User Account utility in ebis

title: As an EBIS User, I want to see a message if ebis is down for maintenance
custom_steps:
Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=login_failure|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=login_failure]

AC:

* If a user attempts to log into ebis while their access is turned off, their login attempt will fail
* The login screen will return the following message:
** â€œEBIS is down for maintenance.
Please check back later.â€�

title: As an EBIS Admin User, I want the ability to turn off access to certain groups of users
custom_steps:
Wire:  [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=app_access|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=app_access]

AC:

* There will be a new 'App Access' section added to the User Accounts page, as depicted in the wire
* Only users with the new Super Admin permission will be able to view the App Access section
** Users w/o the Super Admin permission will see the current layout of the User Account Page
* Within the new section will be checkboxes for the following user types:
** Super Admin
** BOC High
** BOC Low
** Clubs
** Link Access
** WLP
* There will be an Edit Access button when the section is in View Mode
* Clicking Edit will put the section in edit mode, making the boxes clickable
* When the section is in edit mode, there will be a Save and Cancel button
** Clicking Save will update Access to reflect what the user has selected (Any user type that is not checked will no longer have access to ebis)
** Clicking Cancel will return the section to view mode without committing any changes
* Super Admin users may not be turned off

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to edit an Award Bonus Package on a MJ Contract
custom_steps:
Wire:  [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=edit_an_award_bonus_package_within_mjc|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=edit_an_award_bonus_package_within_mjc]

AC:

* When viewing an MJ Contract that includes an Award Bonus Package, the package will appear as a blue expandable header within the Award Bonus section
* There will be a pencil icon and a trash can icon on the header
** Clicking the trash can icon will remove the package from the contract
* Clicking the pencil icon will display an 'Are You Sure?' modal
** Header:  'Are You Sure?'
** Body: "If you continue the contract will no longer include the approved package only the individual clauses."
** Buttons: Continue, Cancel
* Clicking Cancel will dismiss the modal and return the user to the contract
* Clicking Continue will dismiss the modal and remove the blue header from the Award Bonus section
* All clauses and accompanying details of the package will remain on the contract, but it will now be editable and function as a normal contract without a package
* Clubs should not be able to edit the package once the MJ Contract has been submitted

title: As a MJC Admin, I want to add an Award Bonus Package to a MJ Contract
custom_steps:
Wire: [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=add_an_award_bonus_package_to_a_mjc|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=add_an_award_bonus_package_to_a_mjc]

AC:

* There will be an 'Add Package' button in the Award Bonus section of the MJ Contact, as depicted in the provided wire
* Clicking the 'Add Package' button will launch a popover allowing the user to select from the their Org's saved Award Bonus Packages
** There will be a Cancel button on the popover, when clicked, the modal will close
** The Bonus dropdown will default to blank and the 'Add' button will be inactive
** When a package is selected from the dropdown, the 'Add' button will become active
* Clicking the 'Add Package' button will load the selected Award Bonus Package onto the MJC and dismiss the popover
** The package name will be displayed in a blue expandable header, as depicted in the wire
** It will be collapsed by default
** When the row is expanded, the clauses and supporting details of the saved package will be displayed
*** None of this information will be editable

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want to submit an Award Bonus Package to BOC
custom_steps:
Wire: [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=create_new_award_bonus_package|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=create_new_award_bonus_package]

AC:

* There will be a 'Submit to BOC' button on unsaved and Preliminary Award Bonus Packages
* Clicking the button will prompt the user to confirm their action
* If they decline, the modal will be dismissed and they will be returned to the package
* If they confirm: 
** Package will reload to View mode
** Status will update to 'Pending Approval'
** Blue success notification will be displayed
** A Clipboard notification will be generated for MJC BOC Admins
** Once submitted, Club users my no longer make updates to the package

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want to Delete an Award Package
custom_steps:
AC:
 - MJC Admin users, both Club and BOC, will see a Delete button when viewing a Preliminary or Rejected Award Package in Edit mode
 - When clicking Delete, the system will prompt the user to confirm their action
  -- If they confirm, the Award Package will be removed from the system and the user will be returned to the Award Bonus Packages widget
  -- If they deny, the modal will be dismissed and they will be returned to the package

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want to Approve a submitted Award Bonus Package
custom_steps:
AC:

* BOC MJC Admin Users will see a clipboard notification when a new Award Bonus Package is submitted
* The notification will have a hyperlink to the Package
* The Package will have an Approve, a Reject, an Edit, and a Cancel button
* Clicking Edit will load the Package in edit mode
* Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm
** Confirming will return the user to their entry point
** Declining will dismiss the modal
* Clicking Approve will: 
** Update status to Active
** Generate a blue success notification
** Generate a clipboard notification for the submitting user that their package was approved (there will be a hyperlink to the package)
* Clicking Reject will:
** Update status to Rejected
** Generate a blue success notification
** Generate a clipboard notification for the submitting user that their package was rejected (there will be a hyperlink to the package)
** Club users will be able to edit and resubmit Rejected packages
* Clubs will see an Edit button when the package is in Approved state.  However, the only editable field will be End Date
* BOC Users will be able to edit the packages in any state

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want to Create a New Award Bonus Package
custom_steps:
Wires:

* [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=award_bonus_packages|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=award_bonus_packages]
* [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=create_new_award_bonus_package|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=create_new_award_bonus_package]

Data Discovery:

* [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1327530051/Data+Discovery+-+Award+Bonus+Packages|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1327530051/Data+Discovery+-+Award+Bonus+Packages]
* [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3783826/MJC+-+Award+Bonuses|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3783826/MJC+-+Award+Bonuses]

AC:

* MJC Admin users will see a Create New button on the Award Bonus Package widget
* Clicking the button will load a new, blank Award Bonus Package
* The new Package will match the provided data discovery and wire
** Clicking 'add new' label will launch a modal to add a new label name (functions the same way on contract language
** May not have multiple *Active* packages with the same label.  If the user attempt to save a package with same name as an Active package, they will get an error:
*** Text: This label is currently being used by an Active Award Package.  If you wish to continue with this label, please end date that package.
*** Buttons: Back
* Adding the clause criteria will function the same as the Award Bonus section on a MJC
** All clauses will be for "All" years
* There will be Save and Cancel buttons
* Clicking Save, prior to submission, will save the package as preliminary
* Clicking Cancel, will prompt the user to confirm their action
** Confirming will close the package w/o saving any data and return the user to their entry point
** Not confirming will close the modal

title: As a MJC User, I want to see a new Award Bonus Package widget
custom_steps:
Wire: https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=award_bonus_packages

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1327136808/Data+Discovery+-+Award+Bonus+Packages+widget

title: Create Error in Club Comm Batch if Duplicate Club IDs exist
custom_steps:
Value:  CLUB IDs occasionally get reused and this can lead to more than one club having the same ID.  This creates errors in ebis and can lead to WL Game reports not being created

AC:

* If there is more than one Club with the same BAM ID, an alert will be created in the Club Comm Batch .
* Show the error on the individual row that fails

title: As a User, I want to open a sent email blast
custom_steps:
Wires:
 - https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_blasts

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1603436609/Data+Discovery+-+History

AC:
 - Sent emails will be displayed in the History widget on the Email Blasts tab
 - There will be a paperclip icon that allows the user to open any attached files
 - The Failures icon will display the number of emails that were not received
 - There will be a download icon in the Failures column that allows the user to download the list of failed recipients and the reason it failed (if available)
 - The subject line will be a hyperlink
 - Clicking the hyperlink will open the sent email, which will match the provided wire
 - The email will not be editable

  -- Sent By (username)
 - There will be a Close button, which when clicked, will return the user to the Email Blasts tab

- Clicking the button will prompt the user to confirm their action

AC:

 - If 'Send to Everyone' is selected, when the blast is sent, the email will be sent to all ebis users

title: As a User, I want to Print the SFD from the Transfer to 60-Day IL (Minor) transaction
custom_steps:
The MN Transfer to 60 Day IL Transaction will now work the same as the MJ Transfer to 60 Day IL Transaction

MJ Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786605/Transfer+Player+to+10+or+60-Day+DL  

MJ 60-Day IL SFD: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786420/MJ+SFD+-+Transfer+to+60+Day+DL+Layout 

Clipboard Notifications:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard

AC:

There will be a new SFD created for the MN Transfer to 60 Day IL transaction

There will be a “ Received SFD” checkbox added to the transaction

The box will be disabled for Club users if an attachment with a label of "Standard Form of Diagnosis" is not attached.

A notification will be generated when a SFD is attached after the TX has been submitted (Message #6)

If 3 days have passed since the TX was submitted w/o a SFD being submitted, a notification will be generated  (Message #7)

This story should cover the esign process

title: As a developer I want to convert the salary arbitration reports to crystal enterprise
custom_steps:
The following salary arbitration reports need to be converted to crystal enterprise.  The front end should make an initial call to the ebis backend which writes the results into snapshot tables for arbitration.  The report will then be recreated in crystal enterprise using those snapshot tables.  All three reports should be able to run off of the same
snapshot tables.

2+ Salary Arbitration "Super Two" eligibility
2+ and 3+ Salary Arbitration Eligibility
Salary Arbitration

AC:
* Reports are identical to their prior versions (with the caveat that any errors in the existing reports should be corrected rather than just carried forward)

title: As a User, I want to run the Equal Opportunity report for a past date
custom_steps:
Requested by: Ben Coakley (BOS)

AC:

* There will be a new 'As Of' prompt added to the Equal Opportunity report
* The prompt will be Required
* Only past or current dates will return data
* Running the report for a past date will generate the Equal Opportunity data for the selected Org's roster as of the specified date

title: Update MJC Signing Bonus Boilerplate
custom_steps:
Please adjust the auto-generated MJC signing bonus language as indicated below in red:

In addition to the salary set forth in this contract, the Player shall receive a signing bonus as follows. This signing bonus shall be deemed earned only upon Club's receipt of the approval of this Contract by the Office of the Commissioner of Baseball. This signing bonus shall be paid to player on date below, or if no date is specified, within ten (10) business days of the Club's receipt of approval of this Contract by the Office of the Commissioner of Baseball; provided, however, that if the {color:#ff0000}payment{color} date {color:#ff0000}--of payment of the signing bonus will be payable on the first business day following such --{color}falls on a Saturday, Sunday or legal holiday{color:#ff0000}, then the signing bonus shall be payable on the next business day.{color}

title: As a User I want the Trade Summary report to display three way trades
custom_steps:
From EBISII-17147 - The Trade Summary report is currently only able to handle trades between two clubs and needs to be updated to handle three (or even four) way trades.  See the referenced Jira for some examples.

AC:
* All information from a three way trade displays correctly on the trade summary report
* All information from a simple two way trade displays correctly on the trade summary report

Note: we may need to redesign the report layout on this in order to accommodate this request

AC:
 - Add June 30th

title: Convert Average Salary Report to CDATA
custom_steps:
AC:

* The Average Salary report will be converted to Crystal reports from CDATA
* Report runs without errors
* Report data is unchanged from the old version

title: As a Risk Management User, I want to access my Biannual Queries as Self Service Reports
Fix Draft Logo
As a user I don't want any of the R4 draft screens to reload when the draft disconnects and reconnects
custom_steps:
When we moved to GCP, we were forced to put in a max connection time.  As a result of this, when that time passes, the draft connection is severed.  We currently have that set to an hour, but thats definitely going to happen and possibly happen frequently.

Instead of fully refreshing the page when the reconnect occurs, it should instead fetch the draft state silently and update with anything which was missed.
AC:
* When the draft disconncects the reconnecting message appears
* Once the draft reconnects the screen is updated with any chagnes which were missed, but does not fully refresh.  It should appear seamless.

title: As a R4 Draft Admin, I want to allow Clubs to draft players as a TWP
custom_steps:
AC:

* The position drop down on the R4 draft day screen will include â€˜TWPâ€™ as an option
* This position will be available to both Clubs and BOC Users
* Choosing TWP will function like any other position change would (i.e. the new position will be displayed on draft related widgets, reports, and be included in the R4 api to clubs and mlb.com)
* Player Profiles will not be updated to display TWP and that position will not be displayed on draft contracts (as typical position changes would)
* If a player is drafted as TWP, this info will be sent to the Commissionerâ€™s screen
** â€œa two-way playerâ€� will be displayed for the player

title: As a MJC Admin, I want a Currently Outrighted Player Flag
custom_steps:
Description:  There is not an easy way to find outrighted players, as it is not a roster status.  It's currently a tedious manual effort to compile lists of these players.

AC:

* There will be a new queryable flag that can be used to identify players who are currently on outright..
* The flag will be unset when the player is no longer on outright

Note: Travis currently determines this population by â€œgrabbing all active MJ UPCs and then indexing that against the current MJ roster report. The players on outright are those who don't appear on both listsâ€�

title: INC0166382 - As an Intl User, I want to see the International tab for a player who was drafted and signed as a domestic amateur
custom_steps:
Description: Some â€œdomesticâ€� players require Visa information.  These fields are located on the International tab, which is only displayed for international players.

AC:

* There will be a flag created in the db that will control if the international tab on a professional players profile
* If a â€œdomesticâ€� player has this flag set, the intl tab will be displayed and function as if the player were an intl player
* Test to see how link handles this.  If this doesnâ€™t work, a LINK story will need to be opened.



Received from: JJ.Estevez@nationals.com
Recipients: EBISSupport@mlb.com,ryan.thomas@nationals.com,patrick.nathanson@mlb.com

Hello,

Hope you are all well. Please see below. I am trying to update the Immigration information on two of our players' profiles on Ebis but they don't have an International Tab like all the international players do. The players are Paolo Espino and Francinel Martina. I think the reason is because they were both drafted here in the US and did not sign as International amateur players. However, since we have to add immigration information on their profiles, is there a way to add that tab for them?

title: As a BOC Admin, I want time spent on the Dev List to count towards 4th Option requirement
custom_steps:
AC:

* Time on the DEVEL List will count the same as if on the Active List and will count toward the 90 day requirement for a season of service for the 4th option.
* Treat this as a TI transaction (service wise) + the above 4th Option
* Option Tracking Batch and/or Seasons of Service Batch

title: Fix Logic Update Intl Verification Email
custom_steps:
There is an email that is sent to intl amateur players upon verification.  The dates/period logic in the email is hard coded, so emails going out after the system dates were changed are now incorrect.

AC:

* Update the email template to remove the placeholder and set it to 2020-21 for the year
* Set the Eligible to Sign Date to 1/15/2021
* The email that gets sent out will now reflect accurate signing periods and ETSDs

Confirm this is still necessary before doing anything.

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want Reinstatements from "COVID IL" to be obvious
custom_steps:
Related to: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-820

AC:
 - When a player on the MJ 60-Day IL with a Viral Infection is reinstated, the MJ Transaction Bulletin should read "Reinstated from Injured List" instead of "Reinstate from 60-day IL (Major)"
 - The player history will be consistent with this

title: As a Highmark User, I want users prevented from entering fake SSNs on player profiles
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a new rule to prevent the same digit from being entered for an entire SSN
  -- i.e. 000000000, 111111111, 222222222 will not be allowed
 - The new rule check will run on save
 - If the check fails, the following error will be returned:
  -- Header: Error
  -- Body: You must enter a valid Social Security Number.
  -- Buttons: Back
 - Current requirement rules will remain unchanged:
  -- i.e. SSN is not require to make update to an amateur profile, but is required to submit a contract

custom_steps:

 - "Olympics" will be added as a new Reason for Placement value on Place on Temporary Inactive list transactions

custom_steps:

title: As a User, I don't want players suspended by their Club to count against active or reserve limits
custom_steps:
Related to: PIVOTAL-805

AC:
Depending on if the Tx is BOC/League or Team assigned, each Suspended Tx uses its own roster statuses behind the scene each with a different mn under control flag. When a player moves to Suspended/Assign from a Rehab Assignment, a similar roster status should be assigned behind the scenes when coming from a Team suspension."

title: Convert Earliest Recall Date to a Constant
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be 2 new Earliest Recall Date Constant created: one for pitchers and one for position players
 - These constants will now be used everywhere Earliest Recall Date is displayed/used:
  -- Player Profiles
  -- Roster widgets
  -- PIS Report
  -- Option Transactions
  -- Recall Transactions (rule check)
 - There will be a 2nd set of constants (again, one for pitchers and one for position players) created to be used (if needed) with the MN Outrights / Selections to MJ Roster logic

title: As a developer, I want to make make the AMT approaching threshold a configurable ebis_constant
custom_steps:
AC:
- Each period will have its own ebis_constant
-  daysLimitFromSystemValues - threshold will be calculated for each period  

Reference:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789751/Prospect+Statuses

Note:
Players who are 0-6 Months From Signing will no longer be allotted 15 days in a 45 day period, they will now be allotted 45 days in a 90 day period 
PIVOTAL-711

title: As an AMT user, I want to see the Travel Expense Total on Travel Forms
custom_steps:
Visa fees were added to the total travel expense calculation [EBISII-19119] the only place we currently display this value is on the Travel Form table. 

Data Discovery

* BOC - [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789957/Travel+Forms+-+BOC|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789957/Travel+Forms+-+BOC]
* Club - [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789867/Travel+Forms+-+Club|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789867/Travel+Forms+-+Club]

WIre
[https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B|https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B]

NOTE:
Monetary fields don't become visible until the form reaches approved

AC:

* A new "Travel Expense Total" field will be added to Travel Forms
* Placement will match the wire, field must be viewable on desktop, tablet, mobile
* The calculation will be Prospect Expenses + Parent/Guardian Expenses(if applicable) + Visa Fees

title: INC0163996 - Change wording on trade checklist for drafted players
custom_steps:
We need to change the trade checklist wording for the following scenario:

Current Logic:
IF: 
A player's Rule 4 Status is Drafted AND
The Transaction Date is before one full year from his First Year Contract Signing Date.
Display:
"The following player(s) are recent draft selections and may not be traded until one year has passed from the date the player signed his first contract."

New logic:
IF: 
A player's Rule 4 Status is Drafted AND
The Transaction Date is before 9:00 A.M ET on the day following the day that the last game of the World Series had started or 90 days from the date the player signed, whichever is later

Display:
"...recent draft selections and may not be traded until 9:00 A.M ET on the day following the day that the last game of the World Series had started or 90 days from the date the player signed, whichever is later.Â  Please confirm with MLB that this player may be assigned at this time."


Original SNOW from Jeff:
"We need to change language on TRD checklist for a drafted player who is traded in year of trade.Â  It is no longer one year.Â  How about "...recent draft selections and may not be traded until 9:00 A.M ET on the day following the day that the last game of the World Series had started or 90 days from the date the player signed, whichever is later.Â  Please confirm with MLB that this player may be assigned at this time."

Thanks"
